patthana15.22:1.1_0: Nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa
patthana15.22:1.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …pe… nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa
patthana15.22:1.1_2: ca nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.22:1.1_3: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.22:2.1: Nahetuṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.22:3.1_0: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.22:3.1_1: hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana15.22:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca
patthana15.22:3.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (3) Hetuyā
